name: mighty-morphin-mathemagical-wavetables
description: Mighty Morphin Mathemagical Wavetables - create wavetables by using mathematical functions and morph between them seamlessly.

scripts.lint:md:check: markdownlint "**/*.md" --ignore node_modules || echo 'Markdown linting issues found'
scripts.lint:py:fix: .venv\Scripts\python -m ruff check --fix wavetable_synthesis/ wavetable_generators/ wavetable_tests/ && .venv\Scripts\python -m ruff format wavetable_synthesis/ wavetable_generators/ wavetable_tests/
scripts.format:py:legacy: .venv\Scripts\python -m black wavetable_synthesis/ wavetable_generators/ wavetable_tests/ && .venv\Scripts\python -m isort --profile black wavetable_synthesis/ wavetable_generators/ wavetable_tests/
scripts.format:fix: npm run format && npm run lint:md:fix
scripts.update: npx npm-check-updates && npx npm-check-updates -u && npm install
